story.book

Interface StoryView<M>

  • Type Parameters:
    M - the type of model to associate with
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocalStoriesActivity, OnlineStoriesActivity, StoryFragmentEditActivity, StoryFragmentListActivity

    public interface StoryView<M>
    Base View interface for the application Views. Provides method signature for updating when the update method is called.
    Author:
    Alexander Cheung
